items.headline: Go ahead, touch the cornballer
items.description: And I wouldn't just lie there, if that's what you're thinking. That's not what I WAS thinking. No one's called him Baby Buster since high school.

items.headline: She calls it a Mayonegg
items.description: She's a contestant. It's sorta like an inner beauty pageant. Ah, there it is.

items.headline: Juice box time
items.description: It seems like only yesterday you were bursting forth from your mother's fertile womb.
